reviewText: I AM NOT A FAN OF THIS TYPE OF  COMEDY BUT MY FATHER IS ONE. I BOUGHT THIS DVD FOR MY FATHER AND HE LOVED IT. HE TOLD ME THAT IS A RECOLLECTION OF THE BEST JOKES FROM POLO POLO.

I tried to watch this but couldn't follow, it was almost as if he was speaking in another language, thankfully I knew exactly when to laugh. Which kept me from looking like a fool in front of my friends.
